```{r}
library(shiny)

ui <- fluidPage(
  dashboardPage( skin = "black",
  dashboardHeader(title = "Test"),
  dashboardSidebar(disable = TRUE),
  dashboardBody(
    tags$head(
      tags$style(HTML(".box{border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 3px 3px 5px #888888;}"
                      ))
      ),
    fluidRow(
      box(title = "Ratings", 
          width = 3, #adjust the column width
        
        selectInput("tab1_var", 
                    "Select Variable", 
                    choices = c("start_year", "run_time"), 
                    selected = "start_year")

), # close the first box    

box(title = "Plot of Penguins Data", width = 6, #adjust the column width and add title
  plotOutput("plot", width = "500px", height = "400px")
) # close the second box
) # close the row
    )
  )
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  session$onSessionEnded(stopApp) # stop the app when we close it
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```
